name: Anger at Management
description:
Your boss hates you.
But you've had enough.

In Anger at Management, you take the role of a raging employee forcing their way through armies of coworkers in order to take down your greedy boss once and for all. Use furniture, office supplies and even illegal contraband to take down opposition, nothing can stand in the way of your rage.

Created for Game Project 4 at FutureGames Boden.

GAME FEATURES

THROW ANYTHING - Almost all props you see can be thrown.

CRAFTING - Some objects can be combined when held in both hands. See what you can come up with!

DRINK COFFEE - Restore your health with the best brew an office environment can offer.

VOICE ACTING - Done by your own gracious developers for comedic effect.

ABSOLUTE RAGE - Accompanied by fitting heavy metal.
